location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Newnham, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from William Newnham, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire, regarding importation of cloths from England to the Bushire markets and requesting Bruce's advice on sending them to the Persian markets instead in the future. The letter includes a Statement of Woollens imported from England for the Bushire market and encloses extract of a letter sent on 1 June 1808 from the Honourable Court's Commands in the Commercial Department, on the same subject.
